name: joke-searching-bot
description: This application should accept a command line argument using process.argv. The command line argument should be a search term and your application should make an API request to the dad joke API to search for a joke based on the search term. If it finds jokes matching the term, it should output a random joke, and should also save the joke to a file called jokes.txt. If it doesn't find a joke, it should log a message to the console telling the user that no jokes were found for that search term.
author: Yi-Wen Wang
